Name: Employee of The Month
About the game: Salary : €9 - €11 an hour Become a member of The Month, a rural market store that provides for local communities. Staff here provide a friendly shopping experience for customers, answer questions and offer suggestions. Responsibilities may include : Working to accomplish goals Operating the cash register in a fun and efficient manner Stocking shelves Cleaning the store and general maintenance Helping customers find their favorite products You'll learn a lot. You're not stuck doing one task here. Each Crew Member contributes to creating a WOW customer experience by participating in all aspects of the job. If you have a passion for money, we'd love to meet you. We can teach you the rest. The Month is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to hiring damn near anyone. NOTE : Must have a flexible schedule. - Manger First person exploration with unique and unsettling environments. Play with Mouse & Keyboard or Controller. Retro-inspired graphics. Interactable and readable objects at every corner. Multiple endings and modes. Employee of the Month contains mature themes and scenes of explicit violence, gore and bad language.
